option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
hostname or IP address of the system to connect to.
port number to connect to on the system.

synopsis.p: Simple client program for reading complete scans from a fitacf TCP/IP data stream.

description.p: Simple client program for reading complete scans from a fitacf TCP/IP data stream.
This task is for demonstration purposes.

example.description: Connect to the host peanut.jhuapl.edu at port 1024 and download complete scans.
